elements.name: Name dem Aufgaben
elements.title: Take a look at the two diagrams on incremental and differential data backup in Basic knowledge so that you can answer the following questions.

elements.name: question1
elements.title: Differential backup: Which backup media do you need on Friday lunchtime to restore the entire database?
elements.correctAnswer: The last Friday backup and Thursday backup (the data from Friday morning is lost).

elements.name: question2
elements.title: Incremental backup: What backup media do you need on Friday lunchtime to restore the entire database?
elements.correctAnswer: The last Friday backup as well as Monday, Tuesday, Wednesday, Thursday backups (the data from Friday morning is lost).
